elements.name: vaadin-confirm-dialog
elements.description:
`<vaadin-confirm-dialog>` is a Web Component for showing alerts and asking for user confirmation.

```html
<vaadin-confirm-dialog cancel-button-visible>
  There are unsaved changes. Do you really want to leave?
</vaadin-confirm-dialog>
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are available for styling:

Part name        | Description
-----------------|-------------------------------------------
`backdrop`       | Backdrop of the overlay
`overlay`        | The overlay container
`content`        | The overlay content
`header`         | The header element wrapper
`message`        | The message element wrapper
`footer`         | The footer element that wraps the buttons
`cancel-button`  | The "Cancel" button wrapper
`confirm-button` | The "Confirm" button wrapper
`reject-button`  | The "Reject" button wrapper

The following custom CSS properties are available for styling:

Custom CSS property                      |
:----------------------------------------|
|`--vaadin-confirm-dialog-max-width`     |
|`--vaadin-confirm-dialog-min-width`     |
|`--vaadin-dialog-background`            |
|`--vaadin-dialog-border-color`          |
|`--vaadin-dialog-border-radius`         |
|`--vaadin-dialog-border-width`          |
|`--vaadin-dialog-padding`               |
|`--vaadin-dialog-shadow`                |
|`--vaadin-dialog-title-color`           |
|`--vaadin-dialog-title-font-size`       |
|`--vaadin-dialog-title-font-weight`     |
|`--vaadin-dialog-title-line-height`     |
|`--vaadin-overlay-backdrop-background`  |

Use `confirmTheme`, `cancelTheme` and `rejectTheme` properties to customize buttons theme.

See [Styling Components](https://vaadin.com/docs/latest/styling/styling-components) documentation.

### Custom content

The following slots are available for providing custom content:

Slot name         | Description
------------------|---------------------------
`header`          | Slot for header element
`cancel-button`   | Slot for "Cancel" button
`confirm-button`  | Slot for "Confirm" button
`reject-button`   | Slot for "Reject" button

attributes.name: width
attributes.description:
Set the width of the dialog.
If a unitless number is provided, pixels are assumed.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description:
Set the height of the dialog.
If a unitless number is provided, pixels are assumed.

attributes.name: accessible-description-ref
attributes.description:
Sets the `aria-describedby` attribute of the dialog.

By default, the text contents of all elements inside the message area
are combined into the `aria-description` attribute. However, there are
cases where this can confuse screen reader users (e.g. the dialog
may present a password confirmation form). For these cases,
it's better to associate only the elements that will help describe
the confirmation dialog through this API.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True if the dialog is visible and available for interaction.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Set the message or confirmation question.

attributes.name: confirm-text
attributes.description:
Text displayed on confirm-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: confirm-theme
attributes.description:
Theme for a confirm-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: no-close-on-esc
attributes.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on Escape press

attributes.name: reject-button-visible
attributes.description: Whether to show reject button or not.

attributes.name: reject-text
attributes.description:
Text displayed on reject-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: reject-theme
attributes.description:
Theme for a reject-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: cancel-button-visible
attributes.description: Whether to show cancel button or not.

attributes.name: cancel-text
attributes.description:
Text displayed on cancel-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: cancel-theme
attributes.description:
Theme for a cancel-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: The theme variants to apply to the component.

properties.name: width
properties.description:
Set the width of the dialog.
If a unitless number is provided, pixels are assumed.

properties.name: height
properties.description:
Set the height of the dialog.
If a unitless number is provided, pixels are assumed.

properties.name: accessibleDescriptionRef
properties.description:
Sets the `aria-describedby` attribute of the dialog.

By default, the text contents of all elements inside the message area
are combined into the `aria-description` attribute. However, there are
cases where this can confuse screen reader users (e.g. the dialog
may present a password confirmation form). For these cases,
it's better to associate only the elements that will help describe
the confirmation dialog through this API.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the dialog is visible and available for interaction.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Set the message or confirmation question.

properties.name: confirmText
properties.description:
Text displayed on confirm-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

properties.name: confirmTheme
properties.description:
Theme for a confirm-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

properties.name: noCloseOnEsc
properties.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on Escape press

properties.name: rejectButtonVisible
properties.description: Whether to show reject button or not.

properties.name: rejectText
properties.description:
Text displayed on reject-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

properties.name: rejectTheme
properties.description:
Theme for a reject-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

properties.name: cancelButtonVisible
properties.description: Whether to show cancel button or not.

properties.name: cancelText
properties.description:
Text displayed on cancel-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

properties.name: cancelTheme
properties.description:
Theme for a cancel-button.
This only affects the default button, custom slotted buttons will not be altered.

events.name: closed
events.description: Fired when the confirm dialog is closed.

events.name: cancel
events.description:
cancel
fired when Cancel button or Escape key was pressed.

events.name: confirm
events.description:
confirm
fired when Confirm button was pressed.

events.name: reject
events.description:
reject
fired when Reject button was pressed.
